<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# BackRef Node Formatting

Represents special global variables:

1. `` $` ``
2. `$&`
3. `$'`
4. `$+`
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats `$\``

Before:

```ruby
$`
```

After:

```ruby
$`
```

## Formats `$&`

Before:

```ruby
$&
```

After:

```ruby
$&
```

## Formats `$'`

Before:

```ruby
$'
```

After:

```ruby
$'
```

## Formats `$+`

Before:

```ruby
$+
```

After:

```ruby
$+
```
